thread.title: Warriors’ coach taking leave of absence to rehab back
thread.title_full: Warriors’ coach taking leave of absence to rehab back - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Chronicle staff
title: Warriors’ coach taking leave of absence to rehab back
text:
Photo: Carlos Avila Gonzalez, The Chronicle Steve Kerr, right, and Luke Walton question a call in last year’s first-round playoff series against New Orleans. The Warriors announced Thursday that Kerr is taking a leave of absence in the wake of two back surgeries and will be replaced on an interim basis by Walton. Steve Kerr, right, and Luke Walton question a call in last year’s...
Steve Kerr, who led the Warriors to the NBA title in his first year as a head coach last season, is taking a leave of absence from the team as he continues his rehabilitation from a pair of back surgeries he had in the offseason. The Warriors announced Thursday that Kerr is taking a leave of absence in the wake of two back surgeries and will be replaced on an interim basis by Walton. Steve Kerr, who led the Warriors to the NBA title in his first year as a head coach last season, is taking a leave of absence from the team as he continues his rehabilitation from a pair of back surgeries he had in the offseason.
